title: HOW TO WIN AN ELECTION (SPONSORED)
description: Stressed about the election in November? Wondering if there’s anything more you can do besides donating, phone banking, and clicking refresh on Nate Silver’s forecast? Join Andrea Jones-Rooy, a data scientist with a Ph.D. in political science, at the Caveat theater in the Lower East Side to discuss how to get out the vote, think about polls, change minds, defeat misinformation, and handle election stress.
